data.name: Kill The Dragon
data.detailed_description:
A one of a kind hilarious horrific choices matter adventure game!


Kill The Dragon is a choices matter adventure game. You go in search for the dragon to kill but watch out because there are gruesome deaths ahead!

A game to brighten your day during these dark times.

Features:

    - Created by Wallace Lovecraft!
    - Music by wonderful people!
    - Original handcrafted hand drawn art.
    - In 1920x1200 HD glory!
    - Multiple endings!
    - Almost every death has it’s own unique story and art!!!
    - This is a very short game that should take approximately 7 - 10+ minutes to beat but the memories gained will last a lifetime!

data.short_description: A unique choices matter adventure with horrific deaths and wonderful choices!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
data.reviews:
“I’m going to remember some things here and that’s either a good thing or a bad thing, I haven’t figured that out yet.”
ManlyBadassHero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 or better Display
